cases.name: Table scan options
cases.description: Test harness put's the test_array option into a variable

cases.name: e-com PDP
query: , p.id           productNumber    -- outer ref 2 steps up
, aRow.articleId articleNumber    -- outer ref 1 step up

cases.name: Correlated cross join -> error
query: select * from data d cross join (select * from data d1 where d1.id = d.id) x

cases.name: Distinct
query: select distinct d.row_id, length(data) len from data d

cases.name: Distinct with group by
query: select distinct sum(value) value from data2 d group by id

cases.name: Group by. Single value etc.
query: select id * id               single    -- Only single values included in expression
,      id * row_id           mixed     -- Mixed single value and grouped values

cases.name: Group by with mixed qualified and non qualified columns
Group by with mixed qualified and non qualified columns (2)
Group by with having
query: select id * id               single    -- Only single values included in expression
,      id * row_id           mixed     -- Mixed single value and grouped values

cases.name: Analyze select, schema full
cases._todo: Add support for regex assert columns, this query contains times that isn't deterministic

cases.name: if statement (non folded)
query: select @col1 = col1 from source where col1 = 10

cases.name: if statement (reverse non folded)
query: select @col1 = col1 from source where col1 = 1

cases.name: Apply with sub query without table
Apply with sub query with join
Apply with sub query with outer reference
Apply with sub query with outer computed reference
Sub query with a single table source
query: select x.col1, x.col2 from (select * from source) x

cases.name: Order by
query: select col1 from source order by col2 desc

cases.name: Order by function with internal column
query: select col1 from source order by hash(col2) asc

cases.name: Order by expression
query: select id - row_id newCol from data order by newcol desc

cases.name: Order by expression function
query: select hash(id, row_id) newCol, id from data order by newcol desc

cases.name: Order by expression function with asterisk
cases.description: Make sure that computed columns are hidden from resulting schema
query: select concat(id, row_id) newCol, * from data order by newcol desc

cases.name: Order by ordinal computed
query: select data, id - row_id newCol from data order by 2 desc

cases.name: Order by ordinal computed with asterisk
query: select id - row_id, * from data order by 1 desc

cases.name: Order by ordinal non computed
query: select id newCol from data order by 1 desc

cases.name: Order by ordinal asterisk
query: select * from data order by 1 desc

cases.name: Order by column non computed
query: select id newCol from data order by newCol desc

cases.name: Order by ordinal, out of range
query: select id - row_id newCol from data order by 10 desc
cases.expectedMessageContains: ORDER BY position is out of range

cases.name: Order by ordinal, asterisk
query: select * from data order by 1 desc

cases.name: Order by ordinal, asterisk 2
query: select *, row_id from data order by 2 desc

cases.name: Where
query: select col1 from source where col2 >=4 order by col2 desc

cases.name: Top with order by
query: select top 1 * from source order by col2 desc

cases.name: Group by
query: select col1, col2 from source group by col1

cases.name: Group by with aggs
query: select id, count(row_id) count, count(1) count1, count(case when id = 1 then null else 1 end) countExpr, sum(row_id) sum, data

cases.name: LIKE
query: select * from strings where string1 like '%ll%'
select id from strings where string1 like 's_me%'

cases.name: Calculated value in sub query with join
query: select d.id, s.col2, d.id + s.col2 calc, d.data

cases.name: Join on a calculated column
description: Make sure that the calculated column inside subquery in used in the join predicate

cases.name: Reference to non-existing fields in subquery
Selects with for output
query: (select (select 1, 2 for array), (select 3, 4 for array) for array),
(select (select 1, 2 for array) ar1, (select 3, 4 for array) ar2 for object),

cases.name: Selects with for output with table source
query: select (select d.data row_id, s.col1, s.col2 from source s for object_array) obj

cases.name: Selects with for output and subscript
query: , ( select st[0].id, d.row_id, d.data, s.col2 from (d) d for object_array ) obj

cases.name: Selects with for output and case
query: case when d.row_id = 1 then (select id, data for object_array)  else null end obj

cases.name: Selects with for output with no rows
query: select (select 'hello' col where false for object) no_empty,
isnull((select 'hello' col where false for object), object()) empty_object,
isnull((select 'hello' col where false for object), array()) empty_array

cases.name: Selects with for output and qualified asterisk projection
Selects with for output and qualified asterisk projection missing alias
cases.expectedMessageContains: Alias c could not be bound

cases.name: Selects with for output and asterisk projection
Selects with for output and asterisk projection with open_table
Selects with for output and qualified asterisk projection with expression scan
query: (select d.* from (d) d for object_array) obj

cases.name: Selects with for output and qualified asterisk projection with open_table clause missing alias
query: (select c.* from (d) d for object_array) obj
cases.expectedMessageContains: Alias c could not be bound

cases.name: Switch default catalog between two queries
Variable as table source invalid type
Test table option expressions get resolved
